title: VR Arcade
details: Units 1-2, 400-404 York way, N7 9LREnjoy any of the VR Arcade games and experiences. To immerse together book 2 or more headsets

title: VR Escape Room
details: Solve puzzles in a team in one of our VR Escape Rooms (max 6 players). For more than 6 players book 2 rooms simultaneously.

title: Premium Free-Roaming
details: Walk around freely with no wires for an incredible level of immersion (up to 4 people)

title: Group Booking (Large VR Arcade)
details: Got more people than we have headsets? Swap in and out with your group, watch others play. For the best experience we recommend booking 2 or more slots!

title: Ubisoft’s VR Escape room
details: Experience the next level VR Escape Rooms (2 or 4 players)
